string-array.name: descriptionBaking
string-array.item: Delicious sweet and juice applie pie by grandmas recipe. IngrediÃ«nts needed are: - Apples - Flour - Cinnamon - Sugar - Eggs - Ice cream (for topping)
Soft and dark rich brownie. Traditional recipe. Items needed for this dish are: - Nuts - Dark chocolate - Flour - Eggs - Sugar
Old fasioned carrot land cake. This cake is loved by anyone who loves sweets. Needed: - Carrot - Flour - Sugar - Eggs - Frosting - Nuts - Raisins
New York cheese cake. Items needed for this dish are: - Monchou - Flour - Sugar - Eggs - Strawberrys - Whipped cream
Rich delicious chocolate cake. This dish is for family sizes. Items needed to make the dish: - Flour - Eggs - Sugar - Dark chocolate - Milk chocolate - Nuts
American style chocolate chip cookies. Who doesnt love them? Items needed: - Milk chocolate - Raisins - Sugar - Flour - Eggs - White chocolate
